医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究重新审视了药物开发成本的争论兰德公司的一项新研究表明，开发新药物的典型成本可能并不像人们普遍认为的那么高，一些极其昂贵的药物扭曲了公众对药物研发成本的讨论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-research-reframes-the-debate-on-drug-development-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/New-research-reframes-the-debate-on-drug-development-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=104c0851-2e15-460d-8fd7-85be2f0eb0d4 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 02:51:33 -0500 New research reframes the debate on drug development costs
人工智能设计的药物显示出治疗炎症性肠病的希望Insilico Medicine (“Insilico”) 是一家临床阶段的生成人工智能 (AI) 驱动的药物发现和开发公司，今天宣布 ISM5411 在澳大利亚和中国的两项 I 期研究的积极结果，ISM5411 是一种新型肠道限制性 PHD 特异性药物在 Insilico Chemistry42 商用生成强化学习平台的支持下，针对炎症性肠病 (IBD) 设计并优化了抑制剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/AI-Designed-drug-shows-promise-for-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/AI-Designed-drug-shows-promise-for-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e6384a7-4c29-4692-b098-c33e19f83814 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 02:08:36 -0500 AI-designed drug shows promise for inflammatory bowel disease
研究发现高血压可能不会损害 90 岁老人的大脑加州大学欧文分校领导的一项研究发现，高血压和糖尿病等心血管疾病会导致年轻人脑血管损伤，但与个人遭受此类伤害的风险增加无关90和年纪大了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/High-blood-Pressure-may-not-harm-brains-of-90-year-olds-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/High-blood-Pressure-may-not-harm-brains-of-90-year-olds-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72db9310-5063-477b-85bb-55ed0f132ecc Wed, 08 Jan 2025 01:58:43 -0500 High blood pressure may not harm brains of 90-year-olds, study finds
科学家发现治疗侵袭性脑癌的新靶点由加州大学洛杉矶分校科学家共同领导的一项研究发现，针对一种名为内皮素（endocan）的蛋白质及其相关信号通路可能是治疗胶质母细胞瘤（一种侵袭性和致命性脑癌）的一种有前途的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Scientists-discover-new-target-for-treating-aggressive-brain-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Scientists-discover-new-target-for-treating-aggressive-brain-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=748b4877-ff4b-41ea-a94e-158fb018f35e Wed, 08 Jan 2025 01:51:06 -0500 Scientists discover new target for treating aggressive brain cancer
研究揭示儿童心理保健的惊人延误一项新的研究表明，有较高心理健康需求的儿童和青少年正在努力获得他们需要的帮助，或者让他们的困难得到承认。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Study-reveals-shocking-delays-in-child-mental-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Study-reveals-shocking-delays-in-child-mental-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93ee302e-2d18-406a-ba7d-f4a5a8fbdd77 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 01:39:00 -0500 Study reveals shocking delays in child mental health care
甜饮料，酸结果：全球健康警钟含糖饮料极大地增加了全球 2 型糖尿病和心血管疾病的负担，且因年龄、教育程度和地区而存在差异。这项研究强调迫切需要有针对性的政策和公共卫生干预措施来应对这些可预防的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Sweet-drinks-sour-outcomes-a-global-health-wake-up-call.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250108/Sweet-drinks-sour-outcomes-a-global-health-wake-up-call.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=294278a9-7ed4-4dbd-a647-f9ea56a68931 Wed, 08 Jan 2025 00:12:00 -0500 Sweet drinks, sour outcomes: a global health wake-up call
生酮饮食可改善糖尿病患者的代谢健康研究比较了极低热量生酮饮食和地中海饮食对新诊断的 2 型糖尿病和肥胖症患者的肠道微生物群、代谢健康和体重管理的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Ketogenic-diet-leads-in-metabolic-health-improvements-for-diabetic-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Ketogenic-diet-leads-in-metabolic-health-improvements-for-diabetic-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c2d92c7-e906-4853-a6eb-2edbc7111851 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 23:55:00 -0500 Ketogenic diet leads in metabolic health improvements for diabetic patients
咖啡和烟草中的生物活性化合物可以对抗帕金森病烟草和咖啡含有生物活性化合物，可以通过针对 MAO B 抑制、α-突触核蛋白聚集和神经炎症等关键途径来降低帕金森病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Bioactive-compounds-in-coffee-and-tobacco-may-combat-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Bioactive-compounds-in-coffee-and-tobacco-may-combat-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e7f89d3-1599-41e3-9e8b-295e393445b4 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 23:15:00 -0500 Bioactive compounds in coffee and tobacco may combat Parkinson’s disease
美国废水处理未能解决日益严重的有机氟污染问题城市废水处理厂去除的可萃取有机氟不到 25%，其中氟化药物是主要污染物，对美国饮用水质量构成重大风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/US-wastewater-treatment-fails-to-address-rising-organofluine-contamination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/US-wastewater-treatment-fails-to-address-rising-organofluine-contamination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0942cc03-74a0-40f8-848b-4c50ec748c7d Tue, 07 Jan 2025 22:59:00 -0500 U.S. wastewater treatment fails to address rising organofluorine contamination
氟化物会影响智商吗？研究指出风险但提出问题尽管发现氟化物暴露与智商较低之间存在联系，但该研究的缺陷引发了质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Can-fluide-affect-IQ-Study-points-to-risks-but-raises-questions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Can-fluide-affect-IQ-Study-points-to-risks-but-raises-questions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64d2698a-44d8-47ba-b232-169aa6daf45e Tue, 07 Jan 2025 22:40:00 -0500 Can fluoride affect IQ? Study points to risks but raises questions
